title: Script Font - Please Help!
content:
I've looked through what seems like every script font on the internet. Can someone help me identify this font? I haven't even found one that has come close.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015133648im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Happiness_4539.jpg)
author: webbedft

comments.content: It's a little like Hiatus, but not quite it. I'm still looking. Any help would be appreciated. :)
[Memoir](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015133648/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/stephen-rapp/memoir/). Please note the alternate glyph selection.
I just figured it out and was coming back to say that. Thank you so much defiantone for the help!
